title: Measuring matter: Volume 2
creator_credit: Peter Dallas, Bill Walker and Bill Walker Productions
brief_description: This entertaining video which uses an animated investigator Al the Alligator to explain questions of physics. Part one ‘Volume’ sees Al investigating the “Case of the mysterious Puddle of Water: to explain that volume means the space that matter takes up. Part two has Al investigating the “Case of the Falling Picture” where he discovers the effect that temperature has on solids, and liquids, eg. that ice becomes water or steam depending on the temperature. Suitable for Primary level students.
